title: Car battery flat? This batteryless jump starter can get you out of a jam
description: Unlike many jump starters on the market, this one doesn't have a battery that needs regular charging. Here's how it works.

title: Microsoft starts official roll out of Phone Link for iOS with iMessage support
description: Once you have access, you'll be able to use iMessage and view your iPhone notifications on your Windows 11 PC.

title: Microsoft's Activision Blizzard acquisition gets blocked in the U.K.
description: Here's why the acquisition was blocked and how Microsoft is responding.

title: Is this the ultimate wireless car charger? My iPhone tells me yes
description: One of my biggest complaints about wireless chargers is that they can cause overheating. This wireless car charger solves that problem -- and a few others.

title: This Samsung phone is the one most people should buy (and it's not a flagship)
description: It's not Ultra-premium (or even a Plus size), but it delivers where it matters most.

title: ChatGPT now allows users to turn off chat history but there's a catch
description: OpenAI is attempting to give users more peace of mind when using its chatbot. Here's what you need to know.

title: 5 very useful tools and gadgets for better 3D printing
description: I've collected a small selection of tools close to my printer. Here are the ones I wind up using all the time.

title: Ring Cams finally get this very important privacy feature
description: The Ring Indoor Cam was just released for pre-order and will start shipping in May.

title: AI is changing football analysis forever. Could coaches become obsolete?
description: Annotating and analyzing game tape is a bread-and-butter activity for football teams, yet it is painfully time-consuming process that's prone to human error. BYU's engineering department is working on changing that.

title: My iPhone's battery doesn't stay at 100% for as long as it used to. Is there a problem?
description: Here's everything you need to know about your iPhone's battery health (and more).

title: How to lock an Apple Note to keep prying eyes out of your ideas
description: If you want to safeguard sensitive information in MacOS, try using the lock feature in Apple Notes.

title: How to add a UPS to your Raspberry Pi projects (and do it on the cheap)
description: Want your Raspberry Pi to carry on running when the power goes out? You need an uninterruptible power supply. Here's how to add one.

title: 3 reasons why Motorola's $699 ThinkPhone is a dream phone for business power users
description: The Lenovo ThinkPhone by Motorola is a fantastic Android phone to start, but these key features make it stand out from the rest.

title: Amazon just added these new features to the Kindle Scribe
description: The latest Kindle Scribe software update will automatically download over the next few weeks, or users can manually update their devices sooner instead.

title: JavaGPT app lets you use ChatGPT in any version of Windows
description: Housed within a Java GUI console, the new app can run in any version of Windows -- all the way from 98 to 11.

title: This AI chatbot can sum up any PDF and any question you have about it
description: ChatPDF sounded too good to be true, but my hands-on experience proved me wrong.

title: SK Hynix expects memory chip market to begin recovering in second half
description: Despite posting a record loss, SK Hynix expects lowered production output by memory chipmakers to start a rebound later in the year.
